chapter.text: 38|1|saad. shapath hai shikshaaprad quraan kee
38|2|balki, jo kaafir ho gaye, ve ek garv tatha virodh mein grast hain.
38|3|hamane vinaash kiya hai inase poorv, bahut-se samudaayon ka. to ve pukaarane lage aur nahin hota vah bachane ka samay.
38|4|tatha unhen aashchary hua ki aa gaya unake paas, unheen mense ek sachet karane[1] vaala! aur kah diya kaafiron ne ki ye to bada jhootha jaadoogar hai.
38|5|kya usane bana diya hai sab poojyon ko ek poojy? ye to bade aashchary ka vishay hai.
38|6|tatha chal diye unake pramukh, (ye) kahate hue ki chalo, drdh raho apane poojyon par. is baat ka kuchh aur hee lakshy[1] hai.
38|7|hamane nahin sunee ye baat praacheen dharmon mein, ye to bas managhadat baat hai.
38|8|kya useepar utaaree gaee hai ye shiksha hamaare beech mein se? balki ve sandeh mein hain meree shiksha se. balki unhonne abhee yaatana nahin chakhee hai.
38|9|athava unake paas hain, aapake atyant prabhutvashaalee pradaata paalanahaar kee daya ke kosh
38|10|athava unheen ka hai raajy, aakaashon tatha dharatee ka aur jo kuchh un donon ke madhy hai? to unhen chaahiye ki chadh jaayen (aakaashon mein) rassiyaan taan[1] kar.
38|11|ye ek tuchchh sena hai, yahaan praajit senaon[1] mein se.
38|12|jhuthalaaya inase pahale nooh tatha aad aur shaktivaan firaun kee jaati ne.
38|13|tatha samood aur loot kee jaati evan van ke vaasiyon[1] ne. yahee senaayen hain.
38|14|in sabhee ne jhuthalaaya rasoolon ko, to meree yaatana sidhd ho gayee.
38|15|aur ye nahin prateeksha kar rahe hain, parantu ek karkash dhvani kee jisake lie kuchh bhee der nahin hogee.
38|16|tatha unhonne kaha ki he hamaare paalanahaar! sheeghr pradaan kar de hamaare lie hamaaree (yaatana ka) bhaag haisaab ke din se pahale.
38|17|aap sahan karen usapar, jo ve kah rahe hain tatha yaad karen hamaare bhakt daavood ko, jo atyant shaktishaalee tha. nishchay vah dhyaanamagn tha.
38|18|hamane vashvartee kar diya tha parvaton ko, jo usake saath pavitrata gaan karate the, sandhya tatha praatah.
38|19|tatha pakshiyon ko ekatrit kiye hue, pratyek usake adheen dhyaanamagn rahate the.
38|20|aur hamane drdh kiya usake raajy ko aur hamane pradaan kee use naboovat tatha nirnay shakti.
38|21|tatha kya aaya aapake paas do pakshon ka samaachaar, jab ve deevaar phaandakar mehraab (vandana sthal) mein aa gaye

38|22|jab unhonne pravesh kiya daavood par, to vah ghabara gaya unase. unhonne kahaah dariye nahin. ham do paksh hain, atyaachaar kiya hai, hamamen se ek ne, doosare par. to aap nirnay kar den hamaare beech saty (nyaay) ke saath tatha anyaay na karen tatha hamen darsha den seedhee raah.
38|23|ye mera bhaee hai, isake paas ninnaanve bhed hain aur mere paas bhed hai. ye kahata hai ki vah (bhee) mujhe de do aur ye prabhaavashaalee ho gaya mujhapar baat karane mein.

38|24|daavood ne kahaah usane tumapar avashy atyaachaar kiya, tumhaaree bhed ko (milaane kee) maang karake apanee bhedon mein tatha bahut-se saajhee ek-doosare par etyaachaar karate hain, unake siva, jo eemaan laaye tatha sadaachaar kiye aur bahut thode hain aise log aur daavood ne bhaanp lee ki hamane usakee pareeksha lee hai, to sahasa usane kshama yaachana kar lee aur gir gaya sajde mein tatha dhyaanamagn ho gaya.
38|25|to hamane kshama kar diya usake lie vah tatha usake lie hamaare paas nishchay saamipy hai tatha achchha sthaan.

38|26|he daood! hamane tujhe raajy diya hai dharatee mein. atah, nirnay kar, logon ke beech saty (nyaay) ke saath tatha anusaran na kar aakaanksha ka. anyatha, vah kupath kar degee tujhe allaah kee raah se. nihsandeh, jo kupath ho jaayenge allaah kee raah[1] se, to unheen ke lie ghor yaatana hai, is kaaran ki ve bhool gaye haisaab ka din.

38|27|tatha nahin paida kiya hai hamane aakaash aur dharatee ko tatha jo kuchh unake beech hai, vyarth. ye to unaka vichaar hai, jo kaafir ho gaye. to vinaash hai unake lie, jo kaafir ho gaye agni se.
38|28|kya ham kar denge unhen, jo eemaan laaye tatha sadaachaar kiye, unake samaan, jo upadravee hain dharatee mein? ya kar denge aagyaakaariyon ko ullanghanakaariyon ke samaan
38|29|ye (quraan) ek shoobh pustak hai, jise hamane avatarit kiya hai aapakee or, taaki log vichaar karen usakee aayaton par aur taaki shiksha grahan karen matimaan.
38|30|tatha hamane pradaan kiya daavood ko sulaimaan (naamak putr). vah ati dhyaanamagn tha.
38|31|jab prastut kiye gaye usake samaksh sandhya ke samay sadhe hue vegagaamee ghode.
38|32|to kahaah mainne praathamikta dee in ghodon ke prem ko apane paalanahaar ke smaran par. yahaan tak ki ve ojhal ho gaye.
38|33|unhen vaapis lao mere paas. phir haath pherane lage unakee pindaliyon tatha gardanon par.
38|34|aur hamane pareeksha[1] lee sulaimaan kee tatha daal diya usake sinhaasan par ek dhad. phir vah dhyaanamagn ho gaya.
38|35|usane praarthana keeh he mere paalanahaar! mujhe kshama kar de tatha mujhe pradaan kar aisa raajy, jo uchit na ho kisee ke lie mere pashchaat. vaastav mein, too hee ati pradaata hai.
38|36|to hamane vash mein kar diya usake lie vaayu ko, jo chal rahee thee dheemee gati se usake aadesh se, vah jahaan chaahata.
38|37|tatha shaitaanon ko pratyek prakaar ke nirmaata tatha gota khor ko.
38|38|tatha doosaron ko bandhe hue bediyon mein.
38|39|ye hamaara pradaan hai. to upakaar karo athava rok lo, koee haisaab nahin.
38|40|aur vaastav mein, usake lie hamaare paas saamipy tatha uttam sthaan hai.
38|41|tatha yaad karo hamaare bhakt ayyoob ko. jab usane pukaara apane paalanahaar ko ki shaitaan ne mujhe pahunchaaya[1] hai duhkh tatha yaatana.
38|42|apana paanv (dharatee par) maar. ye hai sheetal snaan tatha peene ka jal.
38|43|aur hamane pradaan kiya use usaka parivaar tatha unake saath aur unake samaan, apanee daya se aur matimaanon kee shiksha ke lie.
38|44|tatha le apane haath mein teeliyon kee ek jhaad tatha usase maar aur apanee shapath bhang na kar. vaastav[1] mein, hamane use paaya dhairyavaan. nishchay, vah bada dhyaanamagn tha.
38|45|tatha yaad karo hamaare bhakt ibraaheem, ishaaq evan yaaqoob ko, jo karm shakti tatha gyaanachakshoo[1] vaale the.
38|46|hamane use vishesh kar liya badee visheshata, paralok (aakhirat) kee yaad ke saath.
38|47|vaastav mein, vah hamaare yahaan uttam nirvaachiton mein se the.
38|48|tatha aap charcha karen ismaeel, yas evan zulkifl kee aur ye sabhee nirvaachiton mein se the.
38|49|ye (quraan) ek shiksha hai tatha nishchay aagyaakaariyon ke lie uttam sthaan hai.
38|50|sthaayee svarg, khule hue hain unake lie (unake) dvaar.
38|51|ve takiye lagaaye honge unamen. maangenge unamen bahut-se phal tatha pey padaarth.
38|52|tatha unake paas aankhe seemit rakhanee vaalee samaayu patniyaan hongee.
38|53|ye hai jisaka vachan diya ja raha tha tumhen, haisaab ke din.
38|54|ye hai hamaaree jeevika, jisaka koee ant nahin hai.
38|55|ye hai aur avagyaakaariyon ke lie nishchay bura sthaan hai.
38|56|narak hai, jisamen ve jaayenge, kya hee bura aavaas hai.
38|57|ye hai. to tum chakho, khaulata paanee tatha peep.
38|58|tatha kuchh any isee prakaar kee vibhinn yaatanaayen.
38|59|ye[1] ek aur jattha hai, jo ghusa aa raha hai tumhaare saath. koee svaagat nahin hai unaka. vaastav mein, ve narak mein pravesh karane vaale hain.
38|60|ve uttar dengeh balki tum. tumhaara koee svaagat nahin. tum hee aage laaye ho is (yaatana) ko hamaare. to ye bura nivaas hai.
38|61|(phir) ve kahengeh hamaare paalanahaar! jo hamaare aage laaya hai ise, use duganee yaatana de narak mein.
38|62|tatha (naarakee) kahengeh hamen kya hua hai ki ham kuchh logon ko nahin dekh rahe hain, jinakee ganana ham bure logon mein kar[1] rahe the
38|63|kya hamane unhen upahaas bana rakha tha athava chook rahee hain unase hamaaree aankhen
38|64|nishchay saty hai naarakiyon ka aapas mein jhagadana.
38|65|he nabee! aap kah den: main to maatr sachet karane vaala[1] hoon tatha koee ( sachcha) poojy nahin hai, akele prabhaavashaalee allaah ke siva.
38|66|vah aakaashon tatha dharatee ka aur jo kuchh un donon ke madhy hai, sabaka paalanahaar, ati prabhaavashaalee, kshamee hai.
38|67|aap kah den ki ye[1] bahut badee soochana hai.
38|68|aur tum ho ki usase munh pher rahe ho.
38|69|mujhe koee gyaan nahin hai, uchch sabha vaale (farishte) jab vaad-vivaad kar rahe the.
38|70|meree or to maatr isalie vahyee (prakaashana) kee ja rahee hai ki main khula sachet karane vaala hoon.
38|71|jabaki kaha aapake paalanahaar ne farishton seh main paida karane vaala hoon ek manushy, mittee se.
38|72|to jab main use baraabar kar doon tatha phoonk doon usamen, apanee or se rooh (praan), to gir jao usake lie sajda karate hue.
38|73|to sajda kiya sabhee farishton ne ek saath.
38|74|iblees ke siva, usane abhimaan kiya aur ho gaya kaafiron mein se.

38|75|allaah ne kahaah he iblees! kis cheez ne tujhe rok diya sajda karane se usake lie, jise mainne paida kiya apane haath se? kya too abhimaan kar gaya athava vaastav mein too oonche logon mein se hai
38|76|usane kahaah main usase uttam hoon. toone mujhe paida kiya hai agni se tatha use paida kiya mittee se.
38|77|allaah ne kahaah too nikal ja yahaan se, too vaastav mein dhikkrt hai.
38|78|tatha tujhapar meree daya se dooree hai, pralay ke din tak.
38|79|usane kahaah mere paalanahaar! mujhe avasar de us din tak, jab log punah jeevit kiye jaayenge.
38|80|allaah ne kahaah tujhe avasar de diya gaya.
38|81|nirdhaarit samay ke din tak.
38|82|usane kahaah to tere prataap kee shapath! main avashy kupath karake rahoonga sabako.
38|83|tere shudhd bhakton ke siva unamen se.
38|84|allaah ne kahaah to ye saty hai aur main saty hee kaha karata hoon
38|85|ki avashy bhar doonga narak ko tujhase tatha jo tera anusaran karenge unasabase.
38|86|(he nabee!) kah den ki main nahin maang karata hoon tumase isapar kisee paarishramik kee tatha main nahin hoon apanee or se kuchh banaane vaala.
38|87|nahin hai ye (quraan), parantu ek shiksha, sarvalok vaasiyon ke lie.
38|88|tatha tumhen avashy gyaan ho jaayega usake samaachaar (tathy) ka, ek samay ke pashchaat.
